name: Space Avenger - Endless Space Shooter
description:
Kill aliens, get resources, buy new spaceships and fly again into battle.

Game features:
- You do not need to know anything to control the spaceship, just press 2 buttons (Better individually)
- Easy and difficult game modes (Soon add super complicated game mode)
- Endless mode and uniqueness of passage (Sometimes there is utter nonsense)
- 9 species from easy to almost unkillable aliens (Other aliens are on their way)
- 16 types of spaceships (The falcon from Star Wars has not added yet)
- 3 types of resources
- Flying meteorites also want to hurt you (You can hurt them too)
